data.message: PLEASE let our email notifications return to normal since before last Friday (September 25th's stupid stupid annoying change) to where now email notifications now include the page owners entire new announcement whatttt? Before it was only of with comments PLEASE FIX THIS UGH.. It bombards our email OMG please return it to what it was prior to Friday. Looks like not all of us got hit with it. Only a few unlucky few me included just AWFUL
